events.message: The customer reported a rear-end collision involving their vehicle on the highway, seeking to file an insurance claim.
Claim was reviewed and categorised as an Auto Accident claim based on car collision details provided.
An insurance agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to handle the case.
The customer was sent an acknowledgement message confirming receipt and ongoing processing of their auto accident claim.
The customer was requested to submit the police report, vehicle repair estimate, and accident photos for further processing.
The customer uploaded all the requested documents including the police report, photos, and repair invoices promptly.
The claims investigation team has begun reviewing all submitted evidence and details related to the car accident.
Investigation concluded finding that the customer was not at fault, allowing move forward with settlement proposal.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer covering the full cost of vehicle repairs and associated expenses.
The customer provided positive feedback appreciating the timely updates and fair settlement offer from the insurance company.
The claim approval was officially processed following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the repair shop and customerâ€™s bank account promptly.
The insurance claim was officially closed following confirmation of payment receipt and repair completion.
All documentation and records related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and auditing.
